name: Tahko Alpine Ski
description: Tahko Alpine Ski virtual reality experience takes you to a ride along the slope of Tahko Ski resort in a compact virtual reality experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2797 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek HighDefinition Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i7-4970k / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2979 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek HighDefinition Audio
